subtitle: who was this mystery man how is it
possible that this total unknown had
reached and even surpassed the greatest
mathematical Minds in the world
ramanajan was able to surpass even the
greatest of mathematicians while lacking
knowledge of the basic tools they
employed he did not build his work on
the work of others but rather seemed to
just invent it for himself
since his death nearly all of his claims
have been proven to be correct opening
up entirely new areas of study and
inspiring much further research consider
for example that in his time nobody knew
black holes were something to study yet
ramanujan had already developed a
formula which would be used to describe
their properties Generations later
how is this possible how could ramanajan
have known about things which did not
exist how is he able to provide insights
so far beyond what was understood in his
time
